code: import axios from"axios";var API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem("token")){req.headers.authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token")));}if(req.url==="manager/create-bug")req.headers["Content-Type"]="multipart/form-data";return req;});export var AuthApi=function AuthApi(url,data){return API.post(url,{name:data.name,email:data.email,password:data.password,role:data.role}).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(err){return err;});};export var AuthLoginApi=function AuthLoginApi(url,data){return API.post(url,{email:data.email,role:data.role}).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("err",err);});};export var LogoutApi=function LogoutApi(url){return API.post(url).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("err",err);});};export var CreateBugApi=function CreateBugApi(url,data){return API.post(url,data).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("err",err);});};export var GetBugsApi=function GetBugsApi(url,data){return API.get(url,data).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(error){return error;});};export var GetDevelopersApi=function GetDevelopersApi(url){return API.get(url).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(error){return error;});};export var CreateProjectApi=function CreateProjectApi(url,data){return API.post(url,data).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(error){return error;});};export var GetProjectApi=function GetProjectApi(url){console.log(url);return API.get(url).then(function(response){return console.log(response);}).catch(function(error){return error;});};export var UpdateBugStatusApi=function UpdateBugStatusApi(url,data){console.log(data);return API.put(url,{id:data.id,status:data.status});};export var DeleteProjectApi=function DeleteProjectApi(url,data){console.log(data);return API.delete(url+"/"+data.id);};export var EditProjectApi=function EditProjectApi(url,data){return API.put(url,data);};export var AssignBugApi=function AssignBugApi(url,data){return API.put(url,data);};
